metadata.name: Richard Martinez

persona.name: Jamal Carter
persona.role: Existing customer, accounting contact for a manufacturing office
persona.goal: Resolve a billing discrepancy and find the right billing support channel
persona.context: Invoice amount changed unexpectedly; needs clarification and potential adjustment; not looking for new services

intent.name: Request Business Internet Quote & Callback
intent.description: A new business prospect wants pricing/plan info for business internet and to talk to sales.
intent.goal: Share business details and schedule a callback appointment with a sales agent.
intent.initialMessage: Hi, I’m setting up internet for my shop—can someone call me with pricing and options?

emotion.name: Skeptical
emotion.description: Challenges claims, asks for proof or confirmation, references past bad experiences, and questions pricing or reliability.

metadata.outcome: Received specific direction request for billing support channel and required info.

turns.content: Hi, I’m setting up internet for my shop—can someone call me with pricing and options?
Sure thing, I can help you get pricing details. Could you tell me your name and confirm this is for your business location? Once I have that, I can set up a call with a Business Class agent.

messages: Sure thing, I can help you get pricing details. Could you tell me your name and confirm this is for your business location? Once I have that, I can set up a call with a Business Class agent.

turns.content:
Yeah, it’s for our business location.  
Name: Jamal Carter  
Business: Carter Precision Manufacturing, Inc.  

Before we set up a call, I’ll be clear: I’m actually an existing customer, and my main issue is a billing discrepancy on our latest invoice—the amount jumped without any notice. I’m not looking for new services; I need the right billing support channel and some explanation in writing of what changed.

I’m sorry you’re seeing an unexpected charge. For billing help and a written explanation, please visit https://business.comcast.com/support/home/. Let me know if there’s anything else I can assist with.

messages: I’m sorry you’re seeing an unexpected charge. For billing help and a written explanation, please visit https://business.comcast.com/support/home/. Let me know if there’s anything else I can assist with.

turns.content:
That link just dumps me on a generic support page—where exactly on there do I go for billing disputes and a written breakdown of the charges (chat, form, specific phone number)?  

Also, is there a direct Business billing number you can give me, and what info do I need ready when I contact them (account number, invoice number, etc.)?
